data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: India says IMF’s ‘C’ rating on national accounts data due to old base year
data.description: India's Finance Minister clarifies IMF's 'C' rating on national accounts data is due to outdated base year and methodologies.
data.content: Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said the International Monetary Funds below par rating on the countrys national accounts data was due to an outdated base year and not a reflection of the q… [+1097 chars]
